definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: They will be two games of high stress, very beautiful and competitive.
sentences.chinese: 那将是高度紧张的两场比赛，可观性和竞技性俱佳。

sentences.english: Female bodybuilding is the female component of competitive bodybuilding.
sentences.chinese: 女子健美是竞技性健美运动的一部分。

sentences.english: Track and field sports have dual features of competition and body building.
sentences.chinese: 田径运动具有竞技性和健身性双重属性。

sentences.english: Rowing is also a kind of competitive game.
sentences.chinese: 划艇也是一项竞技性比赛。

sentences.english: Moreover, analyze the skill style characteristic of the rhythmic sportive gymnastics.
sentences.chinese: 再次，分析竞技性艺术体操的技术风格特征。

sentences.english: Competitive sports encourage children to work together as a team.
sentences.chinese: 竞技性运动能加强孩子们的团队凝聚力。

definition: video gaming (as a sport)/e-sports (abbr. to 電競|电竞[dian4 jing4])
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
to do with the masses/mass (meeting, movement etc)
(video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
